channel.title: Need a little help :p
channel.description:
ok, how do i make my commands be admin/mod only?
and how do i add shops? and change the prices, i know how to edit my current shops, but i dont know how to change prices yet. and i dont know how to add new shops :|
thanks if ya help me :rolleyes:

item.title: Need a little help :p
item.dc:creator: @ShIzNeT ShIzNeT
item.description:
@ShIzNeT wrote:

Edit the number after playerRights >= (0= normal player, 1= Mod, 2=Admin 3=Owner)

if (command.startsWith("COMMAND NAME HERE") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(995, 1000000); }

You can have an item command which is for mods and so on.
OR

You can have tele commands which are admin only just add.

if (command.startsWith("adminzone") && playerRights >= 2) { teleportToX = 2340; teleportToY = 3170; sendMessage("Welcome To Adminzone!"); }

Instead you can make a command that only u can use aswell.

if(command.startsWith("Command name here") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your player name here.")) { What ever here }

Hope you like.
Enjoy

Read full topic

here u kn0w h0w t0 change the message if u wanna just inbetween the speech marks

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("masser") && (playerRights >= 2)) { // master by j6612 addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("here n0w d0nt mass"); }

item.dc:creator: @funtwo funtwo
item.description:
@funtwo wrote:

here try this. and make sure ur in the right area 0f client.java.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("attack") && (playerRights >= 2)) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); sendMessage("Y0ur a master 0f attack"); }

what this will d0 is when y0u type it in and y0ur player rights are 2 0r ab0ve y0u will get 99 attack and a message will be displayed.

if y0u tell me what c0mmand y0u want and h0 can d0 it ill have a g0 if u like
